title: Introduction to Node
description: In this first video, I discuss the all the pieces required to create a shared, collaborative drawing canvas with p5.js, node, and web sockets.  I look at the basics of getting up and running with node.js.

timestamps.title: Introduction and demonstration of end result!
Overview of the next steps before we go!
